AT.name: NES™ Remix 2
AT.description: In NES™ Remix 2 gibt es jetzt noch mehr Retro-Remixe zu entdecken! Dich erwarten mehr als 160 8-Bit-Herausforderungen, die auf klassischen Szenen aus 12 NES-Spielen basieren. Diesmal kannst du dich an diversen kuriosen Szenarien aus späteren NES-Spielen versuchen, wie Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus und mehr! Zunächst einmal gilt es, NES-Spiele abzuschließen und Sterne zu sammeln, um weitere Level freizuschalten, bevor du zu den Remix-Leveln gelangst, wo die Regeln völlig auf den Kopf gestellt wurden! Deine Aufgaben bestehen darin, in der Welt von Mario als Kirby Münzen zu sammeln, Link dabei zu helfen, einer grässlichen Bande von Buu Huus zu entkommen und in Dr. Mario zu versuchen, Viren zu neutralisieren, bevor sie die Farbe wechseln. Selbst alte Hasen werden ganz schön umdenken müssen, um diese Aufgaben zu meistern!

AU.name: NES™ Remix 2
AU.description: Take a run at even more retro remixes in NES™ Remix 2! Delve into over 160 bite-sized 8-bit challenges based on classic moments from 12 NES titles. This time, try your hand at twisted trials taken from later NES releases like Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus, and more! Conquer NES stages and earn Stars to unlock extra stages before moving onto Remix stages, where the rules are rewritten and the outcomes are all but expected! Nab coins from the world of Mario as Kirby, help Link escape a ghastly gang of Boos and try to clear viruses as they change colour in Dr. Mario – even retro veterans will have to relearn loads to overcome these encounters!

BG.name: NES™ Remix 2
BG.description: Take a run at even more retro remixes in NES™ Remix 2! Delve into over 160 bite-sized 8-bit challenges based on classic moments from 12 NES titles. Nab coins from the world of Mario as Kirby, help Link escape a ghastly gang of Boos and try to clear viruses as they change colour in Dr. Mario – even retro veterans will have to relearn loads to overcome these encounters!

BE.name: NES™ Remix 2
BE.description: Découvrez de nouveaux remix rétro dans NES™ Remix 2 ! Relevez plus de 160 mini-défis en 8-bit inspirés de grands moments de 12 titres NES. Et cette fois-ci, relevez des défis issus de jeux NES plus récents comme Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus et bien plus encore ! Venez à bout de stages NES et gagnez des étoiles pour débloquer des stages bonus avant de passer aux stages Remix, où les règles sont complètement réécrites et les surprises au rendez-vous ! Récupérez des pièces dans le monde de Mario avec Kirby, aidez Link à échapper à une horde de Boos et essayez d'éradiquer des virus qui changent de couleur dans Dr. Mario. Même les pros du rétro gaming vont devoir revoir leur copie pour venir à bout de ces rencontres !

Diesmal kannst du dich an diversen kuriosen Szenarien aus späteren NES-Spielen versuchen, wie Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus und mehr! Zunächst einmal gilt es, NES-Spiele abzuschließen und Sterne zu sammeln, um weitere Level freizuschalten, bevor du zu den Remix-Leveln gelangst, wo die Regeln völlig auf den Kopf gestellt wurden! Selbst alte Hasen werden ganz schön umdenken müssen, um diese Aufgaben zu meistern!

ES.name: NES™ Remix 2
ES.description: ¡Atrévete con nuevos remixes retro en NES™ Remix 2! Sumérgete en más de 160 retos de 8 bits basados en momentos clásicos de 12 títulos de NES. ¡Ponte a prueba con los desafíos modificados de los títulos tardíos de NES como Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus y muchos más! Conquista los niveles NES y hazte con estrellas para desbloquear niveles extra antes de pasar a los niveles Remix en los que las reglas han cambiado y múltiples sorpresas te esperan. Recoge monedas del mundo de Mario como Kirby; ayuda a Link a escapar de una panda de abominables Boos; y esfuérzate por eliminar virus de colores cambiantes en Dr. Mario. ¡Hasta los jugadores veteranos tendrán que replantearse sus tácticas para superar estos encuentros!

IT.name: NES™ Remix 2
IT.description: Cimentati in nuovi remix rétro in NES™ Remix 2! Tuffati in oltre 160 brevi sfide 8 bit basate su momenti classici da 12 titoli NES. Stavolta misurati in intricate prove tratte da titoli NES successivi, come Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus e altre! Supera livelli NES e guadagna stelle per sbloccare livelli extra, poi passa ai livelli Remix, in cui le regole sono state riscritte e i risultati sono tutt'altro che scontati! Raccogli le monete dal mondo di Mario con Kirby, aiuta Link a scappare da una facinorosa banda di Boo e prova a eliminare i virus quando cambiano colore in Dr. Mario. Anche i veterani di questi classici dovranno tornare ad allenarsi a fondo per superare queste sfide!

Nab coins from the world of Mario as Kirby, help Link escape a ghastly gang of Boos and try to clear viruses as they change colour in Dr. Mario – even retro veterans will have to relearn loads to overcome these encounters!

NL.name: NES™ Remix 2
NL.description: Ga terug in de tijd met nóg meer remixen, in NES™ Remix 2! Zet je tanden in meer dan 160 hapklare 8-bit uitdagingen die zijn gebaseerd op klassieke scènes uit twaalf NES-titels. Dit keer kun je je geluk beproeven in knotsgekke uitdagingen uit latere NES-spellen, zoals Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus en meer! Speel levels uit en verdien sterren om nieuwe levels vrij te spelen, voordat je verdergaat naar de remixen, waar de regels worden herschreven en de uitkomst alles behalve zeker is! In de wereld van Mario verzamel je muntjes als Kirby, je helpt Link te ontsnappen aan een bende Boo's en probeert van kleur veranderende virussen te bestrijden in Dr. Mario. Zelfs retroveteranen zullen nog veel moeten leren om deze uitdagingen tot een goed einde te brengen.

NZ.name: NES™ Remix 2
NZ.description: Take a run at even more retro remixes in NES™ Remix 2! Delve into over 160 bite-sized 8-bit challenges based on classic moments from 12 NES titles. This time, try your hand at twisted trials taken from later NES releases like Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus, and more! Conquer NES stages and earn Stars to unlock extra stages before moving onto Remix stages, where the rules are rewritten and the outcomes are all but expected! Nab coins from the world of Mario as Kirby, help Link escape a ghastly gang of Boos and try to clear viruses as they change colour in Dr. Mario – even retro veterans will have to relearn loads to overcome these encounters!

PL.name: NES™ Remix 2
PL.description: Take a run at even more retro remixes in NES™ Remix 2! Delve into over 160 bite-sized 8-bit challenges based on classic moments from 12 NES titles. This time, try your hand at twisted trials taken from later NES releases like Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus, and more! Conquer NES stages and earn Stars to unlock extra stages before moving onto Remix stages, where the rules are rewritten and the outcomes are all but expected! Nab coins from the world of Mario as Kirby, help Link escape a ghastly gang of Boos and try to clear viruses as they change colour in Dr. Mario – even retro veterans will have to relearn loads to overcome these encounters!

PT.name: NES™ Remix 2
PT.description: NES™ Remix 2 dá-te a oportunidade de descobrir ou recordar ainda mais clássicos com 160 desafios "retro" de 8 bits baseados em momentos-chave de 12 títulos para a NES. Desta vez podes contar com lançamentos para a NES de uma fase posterior, como Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus e muitos mais! Passa níveis NES e ganha Estrelas para desbloqueares desafios adicionais antes de avançares para os níveis Remix, nos quais as regras são diferentes e os resultados são tudo menos previsíveis! Apanha moedas do mundo de Mario na pele de Kirby, ajuda Link a escapar das garras de um gangue de Boos e tenta eliminar vírus enquanto estes mudam de cor em Dr. Mario. Até os veteranos terão muito que reaprender para conseguirem superar estes desafios!

RU.name: NES™ Remix 2
RU.description: Вспомните детство с ретро-ремиксами из серии NES™ Remix 2! Вы получите свыше 160 8-битных испытаний, основанных на классических моментах из 12 игр для NES. В этот раз вам предлагается проверить свою ловкость на испытаниях из поздних игр поколения: Metroid, Kirby’s Adventure, Super Mario Bros. 3, Punch-Out!!, Kid Icarus и других. Проходите уровни для NES и зарабатывайте звезды, чтобы открыть дополнительные уровни, а потом отправляйтесь в миры Remix, где все правила переписаны заново и результат может быть каким угодно, но только не ожидаемым! Собирайте монетки в мире Марио, играя за Кирби, помогите Линку сбежать от банды Бу, боритесь с вирусами, меняющими цвет в Dr. Mario. В таких испытаниях придется попотеть даже ветеранам NES!

SE.name: NES™ Remix 2
SE.description: Take a run at even more retro remixes in NES™ Remix 2! Delve into over 160 bite-sized 8-bit challenges based on classic moments from 12 NES titles.
